commit message:
- New Changelog-Dialog using a Webview
- Removed unused resources
Fixed ClassCastException with LayoutParams from wrong parent type
Fixed wrong API-Level for call to webView.getSettings().setMediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture()
Attempt to fix problems with background access on adapter content
Fix NPE when changing state of indeterminate progress indicator
Fixed html header colors and visibility of buttons in article view
Reduce animation speed, fix error when refreshing content before listView has been created
Removed transition since we have the animation instead and removed invisible background
Removed references on fragments to avoid stale references

Version 1.84
* Fixed a lot of bugs introduced by release v1.83
* Implemented new dialog for the changelog
* Slightly adjusted colors
